com.example.inversekinematics.classes

Class Snake

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.inversekinematics.classes.Snake

  • public class Snake
extends java.lang.Object
    Snake body representation as list of Segments with basic functionality such as extending and enlarging
    Version:
    %I%, %G%
    Author:
    Pavel Mikulas

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private float bodySize
      Current snake body size
      private java.util.List<Segment> parts
      Segments of snake body
      private int score
      Current snake score
      private SnakeState state
      Current state of the snake (Alive, Dead)
      private SnakeType type
      Type of the snake

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Snake(java.util.List<Segment> parts, SnakeType type)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean eat(java.util.List<Food> food)
      Check for collision of snake with food and consume food if collision happens
      private void extend()
      Extend the snakes body with every 2 pieces of food consumed Enlarge the snakes body size with every 5 pieces of food consumed With every food consumed add one point to the snakes score

      • eat

        public boolean eat(java.util.List<Food> food)
        Check for collision of snake with food and consume food if collision happens
        Parameters:
        food - List of Food on game screen
        Returns:
        True if snake has consumed food

      • extend

        private void extend()
        Extend the snakes body with every 2 pieces of food consumed Enlarge the snakes body size with every 5 pieces of food consumed With every food consumed add one point to the snakes score
